title: TRC Healthcare - Megadoses are megapopular, but are they mega-safe? A megadose is a dose many times larger than what is typically used, and since the start of the pandemic, taking megadoses has become almost commonplace. With more consumers taking more of these products and vitamins regularly, it's important to educate patients about the potential negative effects of megadosing and which types are most concerning. Read this Natural Medicine's article to learn more: https://hubs.ly/Q01bX3fN0 | Facebook
